title: 关于masa全家桶的tellme
author: Can_xue-miku
txt_content: 这个tellme是什么mod啊，百度不到用法，有大佬告知吗

replies.author: 二哈大魔王
replies.txt_content: 什么意思.. tell me 不是告诉我的意思吗

replies.author: wersky
replies.txt_content:
上个月底masa刚在scicraft discord里解释了tellme的用途（如果有帮助请评个分:P）
以下转自masa 6月25日2020年 于scicraft discord：

What does the TellMe mod do?
TellMe is basically a mod that provides various types of information about the game. This includes registry dumps of all the things that the vanilla game (or Forge) have registries for.
It also has commands for:
1) listing loaded chunks, dimensions, entities or block entities either by type, by chunk, or listing them all
2) locating blocks, entities or block entities by name
3) listing some information about and the NBT data of the item in the player's hand, or the block the player is looking at
4) counting block or biome statistics/distribution in a given area, or sampling biomes on a grid trying to search for the closest occurences of each biome

CurseForge page with a bit more information:
https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/tellme
